StringTable.Label: BattleTactic_Balanced_Name
StringTable.String: Balanced

StringTable.Label: BattleTactic_Balanced_Description
StringTable.String: No bonus, penalties, or change in battle length.

StringTable.Label: BattleTactic_Assault_Name
StringTable.String: Assault

StringTable.Label: BattleTactic_Assault_Description
StringTable.String: -25% Defense, and your ships get a speed boost to rush in. The battle lasts 50% longer. Ships don't try to stay in formation while attacking.

StringTable.Label: BattleTactic_DefensiveFire_Name
StringTable.String: Defensive Fire

StringTable.Label: BattleTactic_DefensiveFire_Description
StringTable.String: -50% Attack, +50% Defense. Useful when attempting to minimize damage to your fleet.

StringTable.Label: BattleTactic_Retreat_Name
StringTable.String: Retreat

StringTable.Label: BattleTactic_Retreat_Description
StringTable.String: Fleet doesn't attack at all; the battle only lasts half as long.

StringTable.Label: BattleTactic_NoComingBack_Name
StringTable.String: No Coming Back

StringTable.Label: BattleTactic_NoComingBack_Description
StringTable.String: Ships close to the death in an attempt to suicidally crash into enemy vessels.

StringTable.Label: BattleTactic_Capture_Name
StringTable.String: Capture

StringTable.Label: BattleTactic_Capture_Description
StringTable.String: Has a chance to scavenge a ship if you defeat the other fleet.

StringTable.Label: BattleTactic_Skirmish_Name
StringTable.String: Skirmish

StringTable.Label: BattleTactic_Skirmish_Description
StringTable.String: Ships attack until near death; then attempt to flee the battle.

StringTable.Label: BattleTactic_StandFirm_Name
StringTable.String: Stand Firm

StringTable.Label: BattleTactic_StandFirm_Description
StringTable.String: Ships hold their position and gain +50% weapon range.

StringTable.Label: BattleTactic_Surround_Name
StringTable.String: Surround

StringTable.Label: BattleTactic_Surround_Description
StringTable.String: -25% Defense. Attacking ships are arranged around the defending fleet, preventing escape. The battle lasts twice as long.

StringTable.Label: BattleTactic_Swarm_Name
StringTable.String: Swarm

StringTable.Label: BattleTactic_Swarm_Description
StringTable.String: Ships don't try to stay in formation while attacking.
